meanings.definition: The quality or state of being convex.
meanings.sent1: The convexity of the mirror made my reflection appear distorted.
meanings.sent2: The convexity of the hill made it challenging to climb.
meanings.sent3: The funhouse used the convexity of the mirrors to create funny reflections.
meanings.sent4: The convexity of her smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The convexity of the balloon made it float gracefully in the air.

meanings.definition: The degree to which a curve or surface bulges outward.
meanings.sent1: The convexity of the lens helped focus the light properly.
meanings.sent2: The convexity of the basketball made it bounce unpredictably.
meanings.sent3: The artist exaggerated the convexity of the painting for a dramatic effect.
meanings.sent4: The convexity of the wave made it perfect for surfing.
meanings.sent5: The convexity of the flower petals gave them a beautiful, rounded shape.
